oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bob Wills Round Up - 1945 - Reel 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of Bob Wills and the Texas Playboys (musical group) live for the Bob Wills Round Up. The segments are hosted by Ross Franklin. The recordings are from a variety of unidentified dates in 1945. The reel is labeled reel number two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bob Wills
